title: The Japanese press in action
brief_description: The busy world of newspaper production is surveyed. It briefly introduces the daily press of Japan and the role played by it in informing the public of news and comment from home and abroad.
description: The busy world of newspaper production is surveyed. It briefly introduces the daily press of Japan and the role played by it in informing the public of news and comment from home and abroad.
